content.prompt: The excerpts best support which of the following arguments about postwar United States foreign policy?

choices.label: Some Americans called for the United States to reduce tensions with the Soviet Union.
Fear of Soviet expansion led to greater United States international involvement.
The United States sought to recolonize countries that had gained independence.
Many Americans opposed the creation of new alliances in Europe.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
